name: Build and deploy container app to Azure Web App

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v2

      - name: Log in to registry
        uses: docker/login-action@v2
        with:
          registry: https://meet58.azurecr.io/
          username: ${{ secrets.AzureAppService_ContainerUsername_27caa021a67c4b44a31f1e67d67b9d4a }}
          password: ${{ secrets.AzureAppService_ContainerPassword_2845acb739e848a5a726e223980d507e }}

      - name: Build and push streamlit container image to registry
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v3
        with:
          push: true
          tags: meet58.azurecr.io/${{ secrets.AzureAppService_ContainerUsername_27caa021a67c4b44a31f1e67d67b9d4a }}/streamlitimage:${{ github.sha }}
          file: ./Dockerfile.streamlit

      - name: Build and push airflow container image to registry
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v3
        with:
          push: true
          tags: meet58.azurecr.io/${{ secrets.AzureAppService_ContainerUsername_4d32e8a44d2541909b7ced57e206f15a }}/airflowimage:${{ github.sha }}
          file: ./Dockerfile.airflow

      - name: Deploy streamlit to Azure Web App
        uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v2
        with:
          app-name: 'Hotel-Review-Sentiment-Classification'
          slot-name: 'production'
          publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AzureAppService_PublishProfile_7756f4e7d64d4bd7ac011282327ce227 }}
          images: 'meet58.azurecr.io/${{ secrets.AzureAppService_ContainerUsername_27caa021a67c4b44a31f1e67d67b9d4a }}/streamlitimage:${{ github.sha }}'

      - name: Deploy airflow to Azure Web App
        uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v2
        with:
          app-name: 'Pipeline-Automation-with-Airflow'
          slot-name: 'production'
          publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AzureAppService_PublishProfile_7fa8fef1d4fd4df2a37b27eae9cd0d24 }}
          images: 'meet58.azurecr.io/${{ secrets.AzureAppService_ContainerUsername_4d32e8a44d2541909b7ced57e206f15a }}/airflowimage:${{ github.sha }}'
